news.title: Trump administration moves to remove millions of student loan borrowers from payment pause
news.description: The Trump administration announced a proposed joint settlement with Missouri that would soon force millions of student loan borrowers into repayment.

news.title: OpenAI hires Slack CEO Denise Dresser to lead global revenue strategy
news.description: Dresser was named Slack's chief executive in 2023 after spending more than a decade at Salesforce.

news.title: China is buying U.S. soybeans again — but falling short of goal set by Trump trade agreement
news.description: A trade war begun by President Donald Trump early in his second term led China to halt its purchases of American soybeans.
